importFile.documentation:
Imports the given file to this script
* `file` File to import

playMusic.documentation:
Plays the given music
* `path` Path of the music
* `overrideMusic` Determines if this will overrride the current music
* `volume` How loud the sound should be, from 0 to 1
* `looped` Whether to loop this music
playMusic.args: path:String = "", overrideMusic:Bool = true, volume:Float = 1.0, looped:Bool = true

removeFromGroup.documentation:
Removes the given element from the given group
* `groupID` ID of the group to remove from
* `elementID` ID of the element to remove

getRaw.documentation:
Fetches the raw value at the given path
* `path` Path to the value request.

loadGraphic.documentation:
Loads the given image to the given sprite
* `id` Sprite to load to
* `path` Image to load from
* `xml` XML file to load frames from

closeScript.documentation:
Closes the script associated with the given file
* `file` File to close

addToGroup.documentation:
Adds the given element to the given group
* `groupID` ID of the group to add to
* `elementID` ID of the element to add

printState.documentation:
Prints the current state of the game into the given file
* `file` File to print to

trace.documentation:
Prints a value to the debug console and in-game log
* `value` Value to print

setGlobal.documentation:
Stores the given value at the given key in the global space
* `key` Key to store at
* `value` Value to store
* `overwrite` Overwrites the value if already found
setGlobal.args: key:String = null, value:Dynamic = null, overwrite:Bool = false

setRaw.documentation:
Sets the raw value at the given path to the given value
* `path` Path to the value request.
* `value` Value to assign

setShared.documentation:
Stores in the shared space the given value at the given key
* `key` Key to store at
* `value` Value to store
* `overwrite` Overwrites the value if already found
* `inRoot` Store in root
setShared.args: key:String = null, value:Dynamic = null, overwrite:Bool = false, inRoot:Bool = true

removeGlobal.documentation:
Removes the value associated with the given key in the global space
* `key` Key to remove

removeShared.documentation:
Removes in the shared space the value associated with the given key
* `key` Key to remove

callRaw.documentation:
Calls the method at the given path
* `path` Path to the value request.
* `args` Arguments of the call
@return Result of the call

submitChanges.documentation:
Submits the given changes to the instance with the given ID
* `id` ID of the instance
* `args` Changes to submit

createRaw.documentation:
Creates an instance of the given type from the given arguments
* `name` Full name of the class
* `args` Arguments for the constructor
@return Null<Int> Unique identifier used to cache this instance

addScript.documentation:
Opens a script with the given file
* `file` File to open
* `autoImport` Automatically imports all the built-in methods
* `isRelated` Is the file related to the current script?
addScript.args: file:String = null, autoImport:Bool = true, isRelated:Bool = true

getChanges.documentation:
Fetches the values of the given fields in the instance of the given ID
* `id` ID of the instance
* `args` Names of the fields to get
@return StringMap<Dynamic> Values of each field

switchState.documentation:
Switches to a new state powered by the given file
* `file` File that manages the new state

destroyRaw.documentation:
Destroys the instance with the given ID
* `name` Full name of the class
* `id` ID of the instance to remove

callMethod.documentation:
Calls the given method in this script and its children
* `name` Name of the method to call
* `args` Arguments to use
@return Array<Null<Dynamic>> Results of the calls
